Lee Jung Ha

Korean: 이정하

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Lee Jeong-Ha
Native name:
이정하
Birthday:
Feb 23, 1998
Age:
27 years old
Height:
5'11" (180 cm)
Weight:
147.7 lbs (67 kg)

Introduction

Lee Jungha is a South Korean actor. He was first known as an idol trainee and participant in the 2017 survival show, "The Unit." Despite not being able to debut as an idol, he focused on his career as an actor and starred in dramas such as "Run On" and "Nevertheless." In 2023, he had his breakout role in the Disney+ action-drama "Moving."
